display_long_description:
# **FREE FRIEND'S PASS**
This free friend's pass allows you to join your friend as the tiny David player. Receive the JOIN CODE from your friend and join his game immediatly.
To host the game yourself as the giant Goliath get the main game here:
🔗: https://www.meta.com/experiences/vr-giants/8767606526672881/

# Join Our Discord 🔗
https://vrgiants.com/discord

# Step into the world of a giant!
Two players. Two perspectives. One epic adventure. In VR Giants, you and a friend enter VR together—one as the tiny, agile **David**, the other as the towering **Goliath**. Solve puzzles, overcome hazards, and rescue lost sheep across deserts, glaciers, lava caves, and lush pastures. Only together can you succeed.
[media]

# Play Together in VR
David jumps, dodges hazards, collects coins, and activates switches. Goliath lifts, shields, and bridges gaps—but is chained to certain zones. Success depends on teamwork, timing, and trust.
[media]

# A World of Scale & Perspective
Experience the thrill of being tiny or massive. David sees the world from a nimble vantage point, while Goliath towers above, interacting with enormous objects.
[media]

# Solve Environmental Challenges
Lava Goliath can’t touch wood directly, so you must use stones and physics to manipulate objects and progress.
[media]

# Why You’ll Love It
VR Giants is a joyful VR co-op adventure about trust and teamwork. Explore diverse worlds, solve creative puzzles, and experience the thrill of two very different heroes working as one. Perfect for friends, siblings, couples or families.
[media]

# **FREE FRIEND'S PASS**
This free friend's pass allows you to join your friend as the tiny David player. Receive the JOIN CODE from your friend and join his game immediatly.
To host the game yourself as the giant Goliath get the main game here:
🔗: https://www.meta.com/experiences/vr-giants/8767606526672881/

# Join Our Discord 🔗
https://vrgiants.com/discord

# Step into the world of a giant!
Two players. Two perspectives. One epic adventure. In VR Giants, you and a friend enter VR together—one as the tiny, agile **David**, the other as the towering **Goliath**. Solve puzzles, overcome hazards, and rescue lost sheep across deserts, glaciers, lava caves, and lush pastures. Only together can you succeed.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491821714_1356121939630240_527779204132912817_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=NzJvUbCqL1EQ7kNvwHOPpo9&_nc_oc=AdmT7lXlxh9Qo3F8vfkAPjfarsJzj7mXmT8_hZBp1s5zyp7aPCVavCns4_xdd_yno-0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=LRT-8XjPs1-lkpcSlixvIw&oh=00_AfpO5YSh-jGawIJ8RIlov_x_tTHfD5_uOiWkxVl1hCY96A&oe=69656DD8)

# Play Together in VR
David jumps, dodges hazards, collects coins, and activates switches. Goliath lifts, shields, and bridges gaps—but is chained to certain zones. Success depends on teamwork, timing, and trust.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491823326_694850519988508_6578739770601603335_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=EYonmaGyZ44Q7kNvwGS0jSP&_nc_oc=Adn7lVWPjFIEqhEPnzQ2s0IU1bSYK213RAkO0L-8wTgninXqv-6UxqvggZJzDyMlmOo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=LRT-8XjPs1-lkpcSlixvIw&oh=00_AfoijvvULdRcvwAM5cdVGB-pescgk7Mari9sFq6MVxIwyA&oe=69656411)

# A World of Scale & Perspective
Experience the thrill of being tiny or massive. David sees the world from a nimble vantage point, while Goliath towers above, interacting with enormous objects.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499617698_1353650906254728_5022035903359340100_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=h06jTKH7LpMQ7kNvwEq2s7T&_nc_oc=AdkcrWLN24HMkwYyRYEVZSTXKXX19NMxoVbNrPc7L61QQejwcVHGRPuIsqLHNYMGLaI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=LRT-8XjPs1-lkpcSlixvIw&oh=00_AfqYXCVUGJi6sZWTiAd4qV7efb708FlsGAYxEoJwep8rog&oe=69658325)

# Solve Environmental Challenges
Lava Goliath can’t touch wood directly, so you must use stones and physics to manipulate objects and progress.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491824309_1356543212635784_3280496030164545182_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=bXh1miaLihAQ7kNvwER2qC5&_nc_oc=Adkg0wg6h3OGlXbEPZQxi6zmSqhD7keMKRFlUMwh1erwiHnUBVz4lY4LsWahweCnEDg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=LRT-8XjPs1-lkpcSlixvIw&oh=00_Afo7y6j-lMbefdeJZkin4xQjhwZEfTM-0QHQE0sKj_WkaA&oe=696574A9)

# Why You’ll Love It
VR Giants is a joyful VR co-op adventure about trust and teamwork. Explore diverse worlds, solve creative puzzles, and experience the thrill of two very different heroes working as one. Perfect for friends, siblings, couples or families.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491820325_1874770033917360_5101807868344860660_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ZszmIFxYtBoQ7kNvwEFcTip&_nc_oc=Adna2-8rXrzS6HMiUyFugRDkGTxQiu5UE3rsQemTaM-vPs7GmWAYoW64lgrAAbyuWB4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=LRT-8XjPs1-lkpcSlixvIw&oh=00_AfplaykeD-w-8fyhc-4DQdwZK2kIaecRAohgNerUYtklmg&oe=6965791A)
